00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_EXCEPTIONS_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_EXCEPTIONS_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoiseStdHeaders.h"
00030 #include "NoisePlatform.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034 
00036 class Exception : public std::exception
00037 {
00038         private:
00039                 std::string mDescription;
00040         public:
00042                 Exception (const std::string &desc) : mDescription(desc)
00043                 {}
00045                 ~Exception() throw() {}
00047                 const std::string &getDescription () const
00048                 {
00049                         return mDescription;
00050                 }
00052                 virtual const char* what() const throw ()
00053                 {
00054                         return mDescription.c_str();
00055                 }
00056 };
00057 
00059 class NotImplementedException : public Exception
00060 {
00061         public:
00063                 NotImplementedException(const std::string &func) : Exception("function not implemented: '" + func + "'")
00064                 {}
00065 };
00066 
00068 class NoModuleException : public Exception
00069 {
00070         public:
00072                 NoModuleException(const std::string &func) : Exception("source module is not set in '" + func + "'")
00073                 {}
00074 };
00075 
00077 class ParamInvalidException : public Exception
00078 {
00079         public:
00081                 ParamInvalidException(const std::string &paramName, const std::string &desc, const std::string &func) : Exception("invalid parameter for '" + paramName + "' in '" + ( desc.empty() ? func + "'" : func + "': " + desc ))
00082                 {}
00083 };
00084 
00086 class OutOfRangeException : public Exception
00087 {
00088         public:
00090                 OutOfRangeException(const std::string &paramName, const std::string &func) : Exception("parameter '" + paramName + "' is out of range in '" + func + "'")
00091                 {}
00092 };
00093 
00095 class ReaderException : public Exception
00096 {
00097         public:
00099                 ReaderException(const std::string &desc) : Exception(desc)
00100                 {}
00101 };
00102 
00103 #define NoiseAssert(eval, name) if (!(eval)) \
00104         throw ParamInvalidException(#name, std::string("assertion '") + #eval + std::string("' failed"), NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION);
00105 #define NoiseAssertRange(param, range) if (param >= range) \
00106         throw OutOfRangeException(#param, NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION);
00107 #define NoiseThrowNotImplementedException \
00108         throw NotImplementedException (NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION)
00109 #define NoiseThrowNoModuleException \
00110         throw NoModuleException (NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION)
00111 
00112 };
00113 
00114 #endif // NOISEEXCEPTIONS_H
